home_description: I put innovation, passion, and quality into every line of code I write.
about_paragraph1: Frontend Developer based in Bariloche, Argentina. I have experience building web applications with JavaScript, React JS, HTML, CSS and more.
about_paragraph2: As a Frontend programming professional, I'm prepared to apply my expertise. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me.
about_paragraph3: Focused on learning something new every day, and being a little better than yesterday.
services_web_desc: Through a personalized approach, I develop websites with the latest technologies and market trends. Fast, secure and scalable sites, with exceptional performance and a seamless user experience.
services_responsive_desc: In a world that is increasingly mobile, it is crucial that your website adapts to any device. My focus is on responsive design, creating websites that fit and look great on all screens, providing an excellent user experience.
services_seo_desc: I improve the visibility and positioning of your website in search engines. Through technical optimization, URL structure, keyword optimization and improved loading speed, I help you increase organic traffic, to attract more visitors.
services_API_desc: Connecting websites to REST APIs and external services, such as social networks, payment systems, or third-party services, to expand functionality and leverage additional resources.
projects_mountainBreed_desc: Mountain Breed offers you the best freeride service in all of America. Pure HTML and CSS.
projects_PETS_desc: PetÂ´s E-commerce is an online pet store. ReactJS, Firebase and SASS.
projects_messi_desc: Messi's animation created with CSS and HTML.
